```{R, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(MASS)
library(testthat)
k <- 1
```

# $Cov(T_k(X, Y), T_k(X, Y))$
```{R, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
sim_cov <- map(1:100, ~ {
  sim <- map(1:100, ~ {
    # Generate Data
    e <- mvrnorm(n, mu = c(0, 0), Sigma = S)
    ex <- e[, 1]
    ey <- e[, 2]
    X <- hx + ex
    Y <- hy + ey

    return(
      list(
        TkXY = Tk(X, Y, k = k),
        TkXY = Tk(X, Y, k = k)
      )
    )
  })

  # Get Covariance
  TkXY <- map_dbl(sim, "TkXY")
  TkXY <- map_dbl(sim, "TkXY")
  return(
    list(
      TkXY_TkXY = cov(TkXY, TkXY)
    )
  )
})
TkXY_TkXY <- map_dbl(sim_cov, "TkXY_TkXY") %>% conf_int()
```

```{R, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# Evaluate Theory
cov_TkXX_TkYY_theory <-
  12 * n * sxy^2 +
  8 * sxy * k * Tk(hx, hy)
test_that("Cov(Tk(X, X), Tk(Y, Y))", {
  expect_true(
    (TkXX_TkYY[1] < cov_TkXX_TkYY_theory) &
      (TkXX_TkYY[2] > cov_TkXX_TkYY_theory)
  )
})
```
